question: Which of the following assumed the title of Rajaraja and Maharaja?
explanation: Gautamiputra Satkarni assumed title of Rajaraja and Maharaja. He also donated land to the Buddhist monks.Â  In the later part of his reign, he is believed to have lost some of the Kshaharata territories to the Kardamaka line of the Shaka Kshatrapas of Western India.
